column2: All of Snow’s repeated butt-the-kickings[~]seem to have finally knocked some of the life out of this thing!
Hang on a sec. Snow’s been beating this thing up regularly, right?[~]Because that would explain why it seems to be weaker than before.
Good! Then today, we can finally settle the score!
Right. Remember to exploit its weaknesses,[~]and be ready for a long fight. Okay?
